meta description: Qoodish allows you to create maps with friends and share your favorite places.
internal server error: An internal server error has occurred
start new adventure: Start a new adventure with Qoodish.
tell friends spot: The bar you visit when work went well, the cafe you spend a holiday, the best view spot you found while traveling... . Why don't you share best place only for you to friends?
surely your friends know: Which spots bring little stimulation in a life without changes? Surely your friends know that!
share recent spot: Let's share spots you visited recently.
reports will see here: When you add spots on maps, you will see here.
maps will see here: When you create or follow maps, you will see maps here.
notifications will see here: When you received notifications, you will see here.
likes will see here: When you liked reports or maps, you will see here.
spots will see here: When you added spots, you will see here.
select map to copy this report to: Select map to copy this report to
sure to delete account: Are you sure you want to DELETE your account?
delete account detail: When you delete the account, it also deletes ALL of the content that you have created. This cannot be undone.
sure to delete map: Are you sure you want to DELETE this map?
delete map detail: When you delete a map, it also deletes all of the content that has been registered in the map. This cannot be undone.
understand this cannot be undone: I understand this cannot be undone.
sure to delete report: Are you sure you want to DELETE this post?
max characters 30: The maximum number of characters is 30
max characters 160: The maximum number of characters is 160
max characters 200: The maximum number of characters is 200
max characters 500: The maximum number of characters is 500
allow followers to invite: Allow followers to invite other users.
comment review: posted a comment on your report.
sure to delete comment: Are you sure you want to delete this comment?
name: Name
no invites here: When you received invites, you will see here.
report inappropriate content detail: Help us understand the problem. What is going on with this content?
not interested in: I'm not interested in this content
this map is private: Only owner and followers are available.
enable push notification: Enable push notification on this device
push enabled: Push notification has been successfully enabled.
push disabled: Push notification has been successfully disabled.
push settings detail: You can change the settings for the push notifications you receive.
this action requires sign in: Log in to Qoodish and create adventure maps. You can also add spots to maps created by your friends.
unable to get permission: Unable to get permission to notify.
push unavailable: This browser does not support push notifications.
feedback negative: Please tell me what you think is not good for Qoodish.
feedback positive: Please tell me what you think is good for Qoodish.
sure to unfollow map: Are you sure you want to unfollow this map?
unfollow map detail: The reports you've written will not be deleted by unfollowing the map.
page not found description: Looks like you've followed a broken link or entered a URL that doesn't exist on this site.
email link sent: Sign-in link has been sent. Please check your email.
email link sent description: Click the link in the email to sign in. The link will expire in 60 minutes.
email link error too many requests: Too many attempts. Please try again later.
email link error operation not allowed: Email link authentication is not enabled
email link error expired: This sign-in link has expired. Please request a new one.
email link error invalid link: This sign-in link is invalid or has already been used.
email link error network request failed: Network error. Please check your connection and try again
